Hospital Leader” _builder_version=”4.5.1″ _module_preset=”default” positioning=”relative” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“We ended up improving a lot, including sleep and interruptions due to vitals and medications, but no one was ready to give up 4AM labs. We asked why.”
– Sleep-Friendly Labs: Optimizing Testing and Timing, Aug. 7, 2020

“To drive learning, one needs feedback. What was missing for me was any type of feedback on my performance. “
– Closing the Loop after a Handoff: Can Real-Time Feedback…, Oct. 17, 2019

See more blog posts here.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.6.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Our Featured Publications” button_one_text=”View All Publications” button_one_url=”https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/myncbi/1hWDenrQrflAw/bibliography/public/?sortby=pubDate&sdirection=descending” _builder_version=”4.6.0″ _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|600|||||||” content_font=”||||||||” subhead_font=”||||||||” background_image=”https://www.circle.uchicago.edu/files/2020/09/microscope-275984_1920.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_button_one=”on” button_one_custom_margin=”10px||10px||true|false” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”3vh||3vh||true|false” text_shadow_style=”preset2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]
